channel.title: Symbols in Usernames

item.title: Symbols in Usernames
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

argh this is so annoying
ok theres about 500 refreshskills things so i put it above the first one then it says ‘unreachable statement’

for(char c : playerName.toCharArray()) {
if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit©) {
if(Character.isSpaceChar©) continue;
this.destruct();
}
}

     case 61:
setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]);
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
refreshSkills();
setAnimation(645);
sendMessage("You recharge your prayer");
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

break;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2008, 11:19:17 PM[/size][hr]ok wait i tried it actually above the thing u told me to , i didnt get any errors but it still didnt work

case 61:
setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]);
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
for(char c : playerName.toCharArray()) {
if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit©) {
if(Character.isSpaceChar©) continue;
this.destruct();
}
}
refreshSkills();
setAnimation(645);
sendMessage(“You recharge your prayer”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;

item.title: Symbols in Usernames
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

k so now it looks like this…
import java.io.*;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

for(char c : playerName.toCharArray()) {
if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit©) {
if(Character.isSpaceChar©) continue;
this.destruct();
}
}

public int meleeOn = 0;
public int mageOn = 0;
public int rangeOn = 0;
public boolean protectMelee()
{

butt. i get 2 errors - illegal start of type, and identifier expected for the melee thing?

item.title: Symbols in Usernames
item.dc:creator: @Fun_4_me_not_u Fun 4 me not u
item.description:
@Fun_4_me_not_u wrote:

[quote=“Benz, post:7, topic:217751”][quote author=Fun 4 me not u link=topic=286167.msg2316790#msg2316790 date=1215327370]
Here, put this in client.java

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

Note- Not my script, I just use it. Credits go to whoever made it.
[/quote]

I lol’d at the fact that it’s exactly the same as what the topic creator posted.

What did you do… try to leech something that doesn’t work?[/quote]

LOL!! Didn’t know that, didn’t bother to read. But it works for me

Read full topic

Here, put this in client.java

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

Note- Not my script, I just use it. Credits go to whoever made it.

item.description:

remove that crap and replace it with this

for(char c : playerName.toCharArray()) { if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(c)) { if(Character.isSpaceChar(c)) continue; this.destruct(); } }

item.title: Symbols in Usernames
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

Hey.
i got given a code to stop people fromlogging in using symbols in their names like ~ and stuff , i dont get any errors when i compile but people can still log in with it?
heres the code

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public int kickTimer = 1;
public void badNames() {
if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&")
|| playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">")
|| playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(“admin”) || playerName.contains(“owner”) || playerName.contains(“Admin”) || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{")
|| playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains(“SYI”)
|| playerName.contains(“SYIpkpker”) || playerName.contains(“null”) || playerName.contains(“fuck”) || playerName.contains(“bitch”)) {
if(kickTimer == 1) {
sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back.");
if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
checkbannedusers();
}
kickTimer = 20;
}
}
}

i put it almost at the top? maybe it’s in the wrong spot?
idk can someone please help

Read full topic
